case_title: United States of America v. Duran et al
case_info_full_case_name: United States of America v. Duran et al

charges.charge_description: 21:846=CP.F CONSPIRACY TO POSSESS CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE and 18:2 AID AND ABET(1s)

charges.charge_disposition: The defendant is hereby committed to he custody of the United States Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a total term of Three Hundred and Thirty-Six (336) Months. Two Hundred and Eighty-Eight (288) Months on Count One and Forty-eight (48) Months on Count Ten, to run concurrently. (Superseding Counts One and Ten). The defendant is remanded to the custody of the United States Marshal. Upon release from imprisonment, the defendant shall be on supervised release for a term of Five (5) Years on C ount One. Defendant is place on supervised release for a term of Three (3) Years on Count 10, to run concurrently with the term of supervised release on Count One. Criminal Monetary Penalties. Schedule of Payments.

Defendant is place on supervised release for a term of Three (3) Years on Count 10, to run concurrently with the term of supervised release on Count One. Criminal Monetary Penalties. charges.charge_description: 21:846=CP.F CONSPIRACY TO POSSESS CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE and 18:2 AID AND ABET(1s)

charges.charge_disposition: The defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the United States Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a total term of Two Hundred and Sixty-Two (262) Months on superseding count 1, Two Hundred and Forty (240) Months on superseding counts 6 &; 7 . Sixty (60) Months on superseding count 9, Eight (8) Months on superseding count 15. Total term of Three Hundred and Twenty-Two (322) Months. All terms are concurrent except Sixty (60) Months on superseding Count 9, consecutive. The defendant is rem anded to the custody of the United States Marshal. Upon release from imprisonment, the defendant shall be on supervised release for a term of Five (5) Years on superseding cournt 1; Three (3) Years on superseding counts 6, 7 &; 9 and 1 Year on superse ding counts 15. All terms concurrent for a total supervised release term of 5 Years. Criminal Monetary Penalties. Schedule of Payments.

charges.charge_description: 21:846=NP.F CONSPIRACY TO POSSESS NARCOTICS and 18:2 CONSPIRACY(1)

charges.charge_disposition: The defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the United States Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for total term of 94 months on Count 1. The defendant shall pay a $100.00 Special Assessment fee and shall pay all outstanding child support due immediately. The Court waives imposition of a fine, as well as the costs of imprisonment and supervision, due to the defendant's inability to pay. The defendant shall surrender for service of sentence at the institution designated by the Bureau of Prisons before 2:00 p.m. on 7/31/03. Upon release from imprisonment, the defendant shall be on supervised release for a term of Five (5) Years. Criminal Monetary Penalties. Schedule of Payments.
